lyrics:
2 contributorshow great thou art lyricsverse 1
oh lord my god
when i in awesome wonder
consider all the works
thy hands have made
i see the stars
i hear the rolling thunder
thy power throughout
the universe displayed

chorus
then sings my soul
my saviour god to thee
how great thou art
how great thou art
then sings my soul
my saviour god to thee
how great thou art
how great thou art

verse 2
when christ shall come
with shouts of adulation
and take me home
what joy shall fill my heart
then i shall bow
in humble adoration
and there proclaim my god
how great thou art
see alan jackson liveget tickets as low as 22you might also likechorus

outro
how great thou art
how great thou artembed
